column1: om sarva taTAgata pUjA upasTAnAya AtmAnat niryAtayAmi sarva taTAgata vajra sattva aDitizWasva mAm

column1: taTA eva sTitaH vajrAQjalim hRdi kRtvA lalAwena praNamet anena mantreNa om sarva taTAgata pUjA aBizekAya AtmAnat niryAtayAmi savataTAgatavmAm
column2: rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste / dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi sha k'a ya a'atma nam ni r'ya ta y'a mi / sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhishi lca m'am zhes brjod do //

column1: tatas taTA eva utTAya vajra aMjali banDena SirasA muKena praNamet anena mantreNa om sarva taTAgata pUjA pravartanAya AtmAnam niryAtayAmi sarvpravartaya mAm
column2: de nas de bzhin du 'jug ste rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brta n'a ya a'atma nam ni ry'a 'di skad du / ta y'a mi / sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharmma bra brtta ya m'am zhes 'di skad du / ta y'a mi / brjod do // de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste /

column1: tatas taTA eva sTitaH vajra aMjalim SirasaH vatArya hRdi kRtvA murDnA praNamet anena mantreNa om sarva taTAgata pUjA karmaNe AtmAnat niryAt sarva taTA Ata vajra karma kuru mAm

column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to // zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar @303a *// bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //

column1: aTa sarva hRdaya mudrA mantra vidyAnAm yaTAkAma karaNIya tayA vajra jApa viDi vistaraH Bavati yasya satvasya hRd mudrAm mantram vidyAm tu sADayet jApa arTataH tam AtmAnam satvam vA sADya siDyatI tyAha BagavAn vajra satvaH
column2: de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te / sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //

column1: iti uktvA RdDi sidDiH caturviDAH Bavanti tat yaTA jalasya upari caMkramaNa nizIdatA Adikam taTAgata Adi sarva rUpa saMdarSanam yAvat aBiruciH tO= adrezya tvam AkASa gAmI ca yojana sahasram UrDvam utpati aDastAt ca gacCati sarva AdiSaH ca yojana sahasrAt yaTA aBirucita vegaH pariBramya AgacCati
column2: de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang / dpag tshad stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te / bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /

column1: yojana sahasra AdarSena sarva satva manIzitAni jQAnAti sarva BAvAni ca cakzuzA paSyati SrotreNa SRNoti sarva dikzu sa yojana sahasra AdarSena manaH BirucitAH sarva striyaH Fge samutkzipya Anayati sarva hiraNya suvarNa maNi muktA AdayaH ca sarva arTAn apaharati na ca asya kaScid kiMcid Saknoti kartum yat vajreNa api adRSyaH Bavati

column2: slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro // zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so //

column1: tatra mahA sidDi nizpattiH Bavati sva mudrAm hRdaya arTataH sADayan sva mudrA satva rUpI Bavati a

column1: ekakzaNena daSasu dikzu sarva loka DAtuzu viSva rUpI viSva kriyA pravartakaH sarva taTAgatAn sa vajra satvAm dRzwvA sarva AkAra vara upetABiH sarva taTAgata pUjABiH saMpUjya aSezAn avaSeza satva arTam ca kRtvA punar apyAy sarva loka DAtu sarva kAma sarva suKa sOmanasyAni sarva AkAra vara upetAni upaBuQjan
column2: bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad / dang /

column1: vajra satva samaH mahAboDisatvaH aSeza an avaSeza mahA kalpa AyuH BavatI tyAha BagavAn sarva taTAgata sidDiH
column2: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro // zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so //

column1: tatra etAH vajra kula sidDayaH

column1: tatra triloka vijaya sidDiH Bavati

column1: tatas huMkAraH prayoktavyaH
column2: de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //

column1: tatas praBRti sarva tri loka aDipatiH vajra DaraH Bavati

column1: AkASena gacCati sakala triloka cakram parikramya AgacCati

column1: duzwa deva AdayaH ca sarva satvAn huMkAreNa damayati
column2: slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad h'um zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do //

column1: sarva taTAgata vajra huMkAra rUpI sakala trilokam AjQayA vartayan sarva taTAgatAn sa vajra satvAn paSyat = ArAgayan= ca varzahasrAn jIvatIvajra huMkAraH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um zhes byed pas gsungs so // de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /

column1: tatra ayam sarva aBizeka sidDi mudrAm sADayan sarva taTAgata aBizeka ratna mudrayA pUrvam AtmAnam aBizicya sADayet
column2: phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @305b kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste /

column1: tatas tasya sidDasya caturviDam aBizekaH Bavati
column2: de nas grub pa dang / dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /

column1: vajra aBizekaH ratna aBizekaH Darma aBizekaH karma aBizekaH ca iti
column2: rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so //

column1: tatra vajra aBizeke labDe sarva taTAgatAnAm vajraDaraH Bavati ratna aBizeke sarva ratna aDipatiH Bavati
column2: de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro // rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //

column1: Darma aBizeke DarmarAjA Bavati
column2: chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //

column1: karma aBizeke lOkika roka uttara sarva karma sidDim avApnotI tyAha BagavAm sarva taTAgata aBizekaH
column2: las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro // zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so //

column1: tatra iyam sarva suKa sOmanasya sidDiH
column2: de la 'di ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /

column1: yat uta guhya pUjABiH nityam sarva taTAgata pUjAm kurvan
column2: de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na /

column1: sarva taTAgata sarva suKa sOmanasya sidDim avApnotI tyAha BagavAm sarva taTAgata sarva suKa sOmanasyaH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang pa byas na / / yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so //

column1: tatra iyam uttama sidDiH

column1: yat uta vajraDara samaH ham iti Aha BagavAm vajraDaraH
column2: de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin apas gsungs so //

column1: tatra etAH padma kula sidDayaH
column2: de la 'di dag ni padma'i rigs kyi @306a *// dngos grub rnams te /

column1: tat yaTA anurAgaNa vaSIkaraNa rakza padma sidvis ca iti
column2: de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / padma'i dngos grub rnams so //

column1: tatra anurAgaNa sidDiH Bavati
column2: de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te /

column1: yaTAvat padmarAga BAvanayA sarva taTAgata Adi sarva satva anurAgaNa kzamaH Bavati sva loka ISvara anusmRtyA taTA eva sarva satva vaSIkaraNa samarTaH Bavati mEtrI a sParaNa samADinA sarva jagat rakzA AvaraNa gupta kzamaH Bavati
column2: ji ltar padma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro; ;bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro // byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro pa thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro //

column1: svam padma samADinA padmam hastena gRhya sADayam lokeSvara rUpI sarva AkAra vara upetaH catur varzahasram jIvatI tyAha BagavAn sarva taTA tatra etAH maNi kula sidDayaH
column2: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la padma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padmas gsungs so // de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te /

column1: tat yaTA sarva kula aBizeka sidDiH mahA tejaH tvam sarva ASA prapUraNam ratna sidDiH ca iti
column2: de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //

column1: tatra sarva taTAgata aBizeka sidDiH
column2: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste /

column2: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //

column1: aTa vajrapANim mahA boDisatvam te sarva taTAgatAH eka kazWena sADu kArANi anuprAdAn
column2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te / gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no // rdo rje theg pa bla na med // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i // mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na // rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //

column1: sADu te vajra satvAya vajra ratnAya sADu te
column2: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //

column1: vajra DarmAya te sADu sADu te vajrakarmaNe
column2: rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so // rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs //

column1: suBAzitam idam sUtram vajrayAnam anuttaram sarva taTAgatam guhyam mahA yAna aBisaMgraham iti idam avocat BagavAn AttamanAH sa taTAra tArya boDisatvaH ca sarvaH sva hRdaye praviSya BagavataH ca vajra satvasya ca BAzitam aByanandan=
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to //

column1: sarvataTAgatatatva saMgraham nAma mahAyAna sUtram samAptam
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes [?] phya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so //// rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang / pandi ta shraddh'a ka ra warmma dang / bod kyi @320a *//
